players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Diana: "That's a bold lie, Bob. If you were the detective, why would you investigate me first instead of a more suspicious target like Alice?"
You: "Bob, what made you suspect Diana enough to investigate her first?"
You: "I'm not sure yet, but Bob's claim is serious. Diana, can you defend yourself?"
Bob: "Diana, you're deflecting. I investigated you based on a gut feeling, and it paid off. Alice, trust me on this."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the real detective, why did you wait until after I questioned you to explain your 'gut feeling'? That sounds like a made-up excuse to cover your lie."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Diana: "That's a bold lie, Bob. If you were the detective, why would you investigate me first instead of a more suspicious target like Alice?"
Alice: "Bob, what made you suspect Diana enough to investigate her first?"
Alice: "I'm not sure yet, but Bob's claim is serious. Diana, can you defend yourself?"
You: "Diana, you're deflecting. I investigated you based on a gut feeling, and it paid off. Alice, trust me on this."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the real detective, why did you wait until after I questioned you to explain your 'gut feeling'? That sounds like a made-up excuse to cover your lie."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

Day 1 begins.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
You: "That's a bold lie, Bob. If you were the detective, why would you investigate me first instead of a more suspicious target like Alice?"
Alice: "Bob, what made you suspect Diana enough to investigate her first?"
Alice: "I'm not sure yet, but Bob's claim is serious. Diana, can you defend yourself?"
Bob: "Diana, you're deflecting. I investigated you based on a gut feeling, and it paid off. Alice, trust me on this."
You: "Bob, if you're the real detective, why did you wait until after I questioned you to explain your 'gut feeling'? That sounds like a made-up excuse to cover your lie."
